data.text:
After school, on my way to the Training Course, I bumped in to an 
Uma Musume I recognized and another I didn't.
data.processed:
<story>After school, on my way to the Training Course, I bumped in to an 
<story>Uma Musume I recognized and another I didn't.

data.text: Uwaaaaaaaaah!! Uhyaaaaaaa!!
data.name: Special Week
data.processed: <story>Uwaaaaaaaaah!! Uhyaaaaaaa!!

data.text:
The road behind that building over there leads 
to the music room and kitchen. And this way leads 
to the building with the indoor pool.
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed:
<story>The road behind that building over there leads 
<story>to the music room and kitchen. And this way leads 
<story>to the building with the indoor pool.

data.text:
Hokkaido is sprawling too, but to think just one school would be 
this big! I might get lost once… or maybe 5 times.
data.name: Special Week
data.processed:
<story>Hokkaido is sprawling too, but to think just one school would be 
<story>this big! I might get lost once… or maybe 5 times.

data.text: …Oh? If I recall, you're team ＜Sirius＞'s trainer.
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed: <story>…Oh? If I recall, you're team ＜Sirius＞'s trainer.

data.text:
Good afternoon. 
It seems you already know me.
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>Good afternoon. 
<story>It seems you already know me.

data.text: Trainer…?
data.name: Special Week
data.processed: <story>Trainer…?

data.text:
Yes, if you want to enter the Twinkle Series, 
you're required to be a part of a team.
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed:
<story>Yes, if you want to enter the Twinkle Series, 
<story>you're required to be a part of a team.

data.text:
And this person here is someone who's trained 
several G1 Uma Musume. Team ＜Sirius＞'s trainer.
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed:
<story>And this person here is someone who's trained 
<story>several G1 Uma Musume. Team ＜Sirius＞'s trainer.

data.text:
Eh? So they're an important person…! 
Good afternoon, I'm Special Week!!
data.name: Special Week
data.processed:
<story>Eh? So they're an important person…! 
<story>Good afternoon, I'm Special Week!!

data.text:
I wouldn't say important… 
That aside, it seems like you're both looking around campus.
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>I wouldn't say important… 
<story>That aside, it seems like you're both looking around campus.

data.text:
I just recently transferred here from Hokkaido. 
So I asked Suzuka-san to give me a tour.
data.name: Special Week
data.processed:
<story>I just recently transferred here from Hokkaido. 
<story>So I asked Suzuka-san to give me a tour.

data.text:
On top of that, to participate in races I need to join a team, 
right? Just being admitted to the academy isn't enough…
data.name: Special Week
data.processed:
<story>On top of that, to participate in races I need to join a team, 
<story>right? Just being admitted to the academy isn't enough…

data.text:
In that case, I want to join the same team as Suzuka-san! 
I'd get to see Suzuka-san run from up close, no 
from right beside her, everyday!
data.name: Special Week
data.processed:
<story>In that case, I want to join the same team as Suzuka-san! 
<story>I'd get to see Suzuka-san run from up close, no 
<story>from right beside her, everyday!

data.text:
Um… to join a team it's necessary to be scouted first. 
Joining the team because you want to is…
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed:
<story>Um… to join a team it's necessary to be scouted first. 
<story>Joining the team because you want to is…

data.text:
Uwaaaah! Scouted! Just like a celebrity! 
I'll do my best so I can be scouted!
data.name: Special Week

choices.text: You're, how do I say this, very energetic
choices.processed: <size=41>You're, how do I say this, very energetic</size>

data.processed:
<story>Uwaaaah! Scouted! Just like a celebrity! 
<story>I'll do my best so I can be scouted!

data.text: …Well then, we'll excuse ourselves here.
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed: <story>…Well then, we'll excuse ourselves here.

data.text: Okay, see ya.
data.name: <username>
data.processed: <story>Okay, see ya.

data.text:
She had an overwhelming victory in her Debut, but placed 8th 
during [Yayoi Sho]. In regards to that, there was something I 
wanted to ask her, but…
data.processed:
<story>She had an overwhelming victory in her Debut, but placed 8th 
<story>during [Yayoi Sho]. In regards to that, there was something I 
<story>wanted to ask her, but…

data.text: But that's probably a bit impertinent.
data.name: <username>
data.processed: <story>But that's probably a bit impertinent.

data.text: But that's probably a bit impertinent.
data.name: <username>
data.processed: <story>But that's probably a bit impertinent.

data.text: A few days after that, at a Selection Race-
data.processed: <story>A few days after that, at a Selection Race-

data.text: Yo, observing this race?
data.name: <username>
data.processed: <story>Yo, observing this race?

data.text: Oh, observing this race?
data.name: <username>
data.processed: <story>Oh, observing this race?

data.text:
＜Sirius＞'s Trainer-san. 
Yes, Special Week-san is participating.
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed:
<story>＜Sirius＞'s Trainer-san. 
<story>Yes, Special Week-san is participating.

data.text:
I was surprised when I saw the race schedule. She just 
transferred here but is already running in a Selection Race.
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>I was surprised when I saw the race schedule. She just 
<story>transferred here but is already running in a Selection Race.

data.text:
Usually, the Uma Musume admitted to Tracen Academy takes classes 
on the basics of running and challenge the Selection Race at an 
appropriate time, but-
data.processed:
<story>Usually, the Uma Musume admitted to Tracen Academy takes classes 
<story>on the basics of running and challenge the Selection Race at an 
<story>appropriate time, but-

data.text:
She probably entered this early so she could join 
the same team as you as soon as possible.
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>She probably entered this early so she could join 
<story>the same team as you as soon as possible.

data.text:
She probably entered this early so she could join 
the same team as you as soon as possible.
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>She probably entered this early so she could join 
<story>the same team as you as soon as possible.

data.text:
That may be the case… 
But it seems like Special Week-san already has a dream in mind.
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed:
<story>That may be the case… 
<story>But it seems like Special Week-san already has a dream in mind.

data.text:
A dream to run in the Twinkle Series, 
and become "Japan's #1 Uma Musume".
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed:
<story>A dream to run in the Twinkle Series, 
<story>and become "Japan's #1 Uma Musume".

data.text:
I've just met her, 
but Special Week-san's straight-forward feelings reached me.
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed:
<story>I've just met her, 
<story>but Special Week-san's straight-forward feelings reached me.

data.text:
Silence Suzuka's facial expression while saying that, 
seemed very melancholy… Completely different from 
her expression during her Debut race.
data.processed:
<story>Silence Suzuka's facial expression while saying that, 
<story>seemed very melancholy… Completely different from 
<story>her expression during her Debut race.

data.text:
Somehow, it seems like you're speaking as if you 
haven't sorted out your own feelings yet.
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>Somehow, it seems like you're speaking as if you 
<story>haven't sorted out your own feelings yet.

data.text: Eh…?
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed: <story>Eh…?

data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed: <story>… I…

data.text:
Selection Race, 3rd Round. 
The participating Uma Musume have settled in to their gates.
data.name: Commentator
data.processed:
<story>Selection Race, 3rd Round. 
<story>The participating Uma Musume have settled in to their gates.

data.text: Ah… the race is starting.
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed: <story>Ah… the race is starting.

data.text:
Number 6, Special Week! To make up for her late start, 
she enters a Long Spurt from the third corner!
data.name: Commentator
data.processed:
<story>Number 6, Special Week! To make up for her late start, 
<story>she enters a Long Spurt from the third corner!

data.text:
She's catching up! 
And now she's taking the lead!
data.name: Commentator
data.processed:
<story>She's catching up! 
<story>And now she's taking the lead!

data.text: Special Week-san, could it be…!
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed: <story>Special Week-san, could it be…!

data.text:
She's got considerable determination for victory, 
how could I have missed that?! And that straight-forward 
expression… she might do it!
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>She's got considerable determination for victory, 
<story>how could I have missed that?! And that straight-forward 
<story>expression… she might do it!

data.text:
She's got considerable determination for victory, 
how could I have missed that?! And that straight-forward 
expression… she might do it!
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>She's got considerable determination for victory, 
<story>how could I have missed that?! And that straight-forward 
<story>expression… she might do it!

data.text:
With the way Special Week is running, after moving 
to Tokyo to chase her dreams, she might really be 
able to realize her dreams… however-
data.processed:
<story>With the way Special Week is running, after moving 
<story>to Tokyo to chase her dreams, she might really be 
<story>able to realize her dreams… however-

data.text:
…Wait!? What's wrong with Special Week?! Special Week stopped 
and is just standing there. What's she waving at?!
data.name: Commentator
data.processed:
<story>…Wait!? What's wrong with Special Week?! Special Week stopped 
<story>and is just standing there. What's she waving at?!

data.text:
I did it, Suzuka-san! 
I got first place!
data.name: Special Week
data.processed:
<story>I did it, Suzuka-san! 
<story>I got first place!

data.text:
Oh no! It seems like she's mistaken where the goal was! 
In the meantime, everyone is passing Special Week!
data.name: Commentator
data.processed:
<story>Oh no! It seems like she's mistaken where the goal was! 
<story>In the meantime, everyone is passing Special Week!

data.text: Ehhhhhhh?!
data.name: Special Week
data.processed: <story>Ehhhhhhh?!

data.text:
Um, starting today I'll be in your care, 
I'm Special Week! Please treat me well!
data.name: Special Week
data.processed:
<story>Um, starting today I'll be in your care, 
<story>I'm Special Week! Please treat me well!

data.text:
Uwooooo!! A new member! 
Special Week, so Spe-chan! Treat me well!
data.name: Winning Ticket
data.processed:
<story>Uwooooo!! A new member! 
<story>Special Week, so Spe-chan! Treat me well!

data.text:
I really wanted to join Suzuka-san's team but, 
I really screwed up during the Selection Race…
data.name: Special Week
data.processed:
<story>I really wanted to join Suzuka-san's team but, 
<story>I really screwed up during the Selection Race…

data.text:
But! But! Trainer-san spoke to me and told 
me ＜Sirius＞ was a great team so I joined!
data.name: Special Week
data.processed:
<story>But! But! Trainer-san spoke to me and told 
<story>me ＜Sirius＞ was a great team so I joined!

data.text: Hooooou… So ＜Sirius＞ was just an after thought for you.
data.name: Gold Ship
data.processed: <story>Hooooou… So ＜Sirius＞ was just an after thought for you.

data.text:
…eh?! N-no! You're wrong! It's true that I wanted to join the 
same team as Suzuka-san though…
data.name: Special Week
data.processed:
<story>…eh?! N-no! You're wrong! It's true that I wanted to join the 
<story>same team as Suzuka-san though…

data.text:
So you came here because you were out of luck!! 
I'm gonna make you "Japan's Most Unfortunate Uma Musume"!
data.name: Gold Ship
data.processed:
<story>So you came here because you were out of luck!! 
<story>I'm gonna make you "Japan's Most Unfortunate Uma Musume"!

data.text: Ueeeeeeeeehhh!?
data.name: Special Week
data.processed: <story>Ueeeeeeeeehhh!?

data.text:
C'mon!! Don't stand there spacin' out!! 
If you wanna become Japan's #1 then run like hell!!
data.name: Gold Ship
data.processed:
<story>C'mon!! Don't stand there spacin' out!! 
<story>If you wanna become Japan's #1 then run like hell!!

data.text: U-understoooood!!
data.name: Special Week
data.processed: <story>U-understoooood!!

data.text:
She's a little rough around the edges, but like Silence Suzuka 
said, her pure desire to chase her dream reached me.
data.processed:
<story>She's a little rough around the edges, but like Silence Suzuka 
<story>said, her pure desire to chase her dream reached me.

data.text:
Special Week is someone who makes you feel like you want to 
support those straight-forward dreams.
data.processed:
<story>Special Week is someone who makes you feel like you want to 
<story>support those straight-forward dreams.
